item.title: The RustyHermit Unikernel
item.description: RustyHermit is a unikernel, which is completely written Rust. Unikernels are application images that directly contain the kernel as a library, so they do not require an installed operating system (OS).Â They are typical used in virtualized environments, which build the backbone of typical cloud / edge infrastructures.
